choose.when: select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.hit, a.reg_date, a.g_no, a.o_no, a.depth, a.user_no, b.name from board a join user b on a.user_no = b.no order by g_no desc, o_no limit #{startOffset }, #{size }
choose.otherwise: select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.hit, a.reg_date, a.g_no, a.o_no, a.depth, a.user_no, b.name from board a join user b on a.user_no = b.no where title like '%${keyword }%' or contents like '%${keyword }%' order by g_no desc, o_no limit #{startOffset }, #{size }
select count(*) from board where title like '%${_parameter }%' or contents like '%${_parameter }%'

mapper.select: select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.hit, a.reg_date, a.g_no, a.o_no, a.depth, a.user_no, b.name from board a join user b on a.user_no = b.no where a.no = #{no }
mapper.insert: insert into board select null, #{title }, #{contents }, 0, now(), max(g_no)+1, 1, 0, #{userNo } from board
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title }, contents = #{contents } where no = #{no }
